name: Timothy's Trials
description:
Help Timothy the yellow cube traverse the treacherous obstacles. Avoid spikes, moving death boxes, and ride moving platforms to get to safety. Good luck... Try not to rage...

MUSIC: 

Fantasy Motion [loop ready] by Alexander Nakarada

Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/8059-fantasy-motion-loop-ready
